tree
Class Tree<V>

java.lang.Object
  tree.Tree<V>
Type Parameters:
V - Value that each node holds
public class Tree<V>
extends java.lang.Object

Tree class. Each node only keeps information about its direct descendents. No loops are allowed in the tree.

Author:
Xiaolu Xu

parse

public static Tree<java.lang.String> parse(java.lang.String s)
                                    throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Parses a string of the general form value(child, child, ..., child) and returns the corresponding tree. Children may be separated by commas and/or spaces. Node values are all Strings.

Parameters:
s - The String to be parsed.
Returns:
The resultant Tree<String<.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If problems are detected in the input string.
